title: How I Find KDP Niche Ideas FAST!!
description:
New to KDP Publishing? - Start Here: https://youtu.be/LAIDXxUAgNw

Book Bolt (Use paul20 to get 20% OFF): https://bit.ly/3jY7K2L

Creative Fabrica Special Deal: http://bit.ly/3XLaKoc

Coming up with KDP niche ideas is one of the biggest difficulties many no content and low content publishers have. Picking niches is the starting point for any online publishing business. In this video I give you 7 tips and ways to find your own profitable KDP niche ideas so you can succeed on Amazon.
